name: Ghostfolio
short_description: Modern wealth management platform for tracking stocks, ETFs, cryptocurrencies, and assets.
description: Ghostfolio is a modern, open-source wealth management application for tracking your complete financial portfolio. It supports stocks, ETFs, cryptocurrencies, commodities, and custom assets. Features include real-time price updates via public APIs, portfolio analysis with allocation charts, performance comparison against benchmarks, net worth tracking over time, rule-based investing (Robo-advisor), data export for spreadsheets, and a clean, responsive UI. Perfect for investors who want a private, self-hosted alternative to commercial tools like Mint, Personal Capital, or CoinTracking.
usecases: Track your complete investment portfolio across stocks, ETFs, and crypto.
Monitor net worth over time with historical charts.
Make data-driven investment decisions with portfolio analysis tools.
notes: Supports real-time price updates from public APIs
Redis used for caching price data
